name: Title Color Match
description: A modification of GradientLogoTitleCard that includes the option to auto-select font color based on logo color.
This card will also automatically crop off extraneous transparent space from around the logo.

name: Blacklist
description: Title Card intended for the 'The Blacklist' television series
This Card features a prominent title and a customizable 'blacklist number' beneath the title.
The default Font for this card is a modified version of Helvetica.

name: White Text Broadcast
description: Card based on Wdvh's White Text Absolute card, using the same format, but has the season number included in the episode text.

name: Star Wars (Title Only)
description: A variation of the standard Star Wars Card for Shows Like Obi-Wan Kenobi that use Part/Chapter and similar as episode titles.
This card also uses a modified star gradient so that more of the left side of the image is visible.

name: White Text Absolute
description: Modification of the Standard card type that uses the same fonts and sizes but hides the season text and has the episode count positioned in the left top corner.
The title text is positioned even lower than the Standard card.

supported_extras.name: Background Color
supported_extras.description: Color to use for the card background

name: White Text Standard
description: Modification of the Standard Card Type.
This Card uses a different font, smaller text size, and the episode title is positioned lower than the Standard Card Type.

supported_extras.name: Separator Character
supported_extras.description: Character to separate the season and episode text

supported_extras.name: Background Color
supported_extras.description: Color to use for the card background

supported_extras.name: Separator Character
supported_extras.description: Character to separate the season and episode text

supported_extras.name: Background Color
supported_extras.description: Color to use for the card background

name: Retro
description: Card type featuring a VHS/Camcorder inspired overlay.
The 'Play' button can be set to 'Rewind' and the image greyscaled when the item has been played.

supported_extras.name: Black & White Override
supported_extras.description: Override the Black & White modification - should be 'bw' or 'color'

supported_extras.name: Style Override
supported_extras.description: Override the play/rewind style - should be 'play' or 'rewind'

name: Slim
description: Card type closely following the Standard Title Card but with slimmed down margins to save space.

supported_extras.name: Gradient Omission
supported_extras.description: Whether to omit the gradient overlay from this Card
